question_title: Will Ukraine extend martial law beyond November 5, 2025?
search_query: Will Ukraine extend martial law beyond November 5, 2025?

search_results.title: Zelenskyy signs extension of martial law and mobilization until November 2025
Ukrainian parliament extends martial law and mobilisation until 5 November
search_results.text:
Results of the vote. Photo: Zhelezniak

The Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine (Ukrainian parliament) approved on 15 July the extension of martial law and general mobilisation for another 90 days, until 5 November 2025.

**Source**: MP Yaroslav [Zhelezniak](https://t.me/yzheleznyak/13351)

**Details**: Zhelezniak said that the decision was supported by 320 MPs, with one against. It will take effect on 7 August and will remain in force for 90 days, i.e. until 5 November 2025.

Advertisement:

This is the sixteenth extension since the start of Russia’s full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

**Background**: On 16 April, the Verkhovna Rada [extended](https://www.pravda.com.ua/eng/news/2025/04/16/7507807/) martial law in Ukraine, as well as mobilisation, for three months, until 6 August.

**Support Ukrainska Pravda on** [**Patreon**](https://www.patreon.com/pravdaua) **!**

[mobilisation](https://www.pravda.com.ua/eng/tags/mobilization/) [Verkhovna Rada](https://www.pravda.com.ua/eng/tags/verkhovna-rada/)

search_results.title: Ukraine Set to Extend Martial Law Again, Pushing Back Prospect of Elections
search_results.text:
# Ukraine Set to Extend Martial Law Again, Pushing Back Prospect of Elections

By Reuters

\|

April 11, 2025

By Reuters

\|

April 11, 2025, at 6:57 a.m.

SaveAdd us onComment

_More_

Ukraine Set to Extend Martial Law Again, Pushing Back Prospect of Elections

_More_

Reuters

FILE PHOTO: Sandbags are placed on a public building's windows while local residents walk past a sign reading 'Kyiv', as Russia's attack on Ukraine continues, in Kyiv, Ukraine May 22, 2022. REUTERS/Ivan Alvarado/File Photo

By Olena Harmash

KYIV (Reuters) - Ukrainian lawmakers are almost certain to extend martial law again before it expires on May 9, the parliamentary speaker has said, determined to uphold democracy even as the United States and Russia pressure Kyiv to hold a new vote.

# Ukraine Extends Martial Law and Mobilization Until November

metadata.title: Will Ukraine extend martial law beyond November 5, 2025?
metadata.description:
President Volodymyr Zelenskyy declared [martial law](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martial_law_in_Ukraine#2022_martial_law) in Ukraine on February 24, 2022, in response to the Russian invasion of Ukraine that began earlier that day. As the [ensuing war](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russo-Ukrainian_war_\(2022%E2%80%93present\)) has dragged on, the government has extended martial law [16 times](https://newsukraine.rbc.ua/news/ukraine-prolongs-martial-law-mobilization-1752577500.html). (At first, each declaration of martial law was good for thirty days, but since May 2022, martial law has been extended for 90-day periods.)

One consequence of this lengthy period of martial law is that national elections, which would have occurred [in 2023](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Next_Ukrainian_parliamentary_election), have been postponed indefinitely. Nevertheless, [some observers](https://www.saisjournal.eu/article/98-George-Kent-War-and-Democracy.cfm) argue that the rule of law in Ukraine remains strong.

The current period of martial law is scheduled to expire on [November 5, 2025](https://newsukraine.rbc.ua/news/zelenskyy-signs-extension-of-martial-law-1753442234.html), unless the government again renews it.

`{"format":"metac_reveal_and_close_in_period","info":{"post_id":40227,"question_id":39761}}`
metadata.resolution_criteria: This question will resolve as Yes if Ukraine extends martial law beyond November 5, 2025.
